extendedInfo.description: Fill each of the piece of the puzzle with one of the four available colors. Donât let pieces of the same color touch (share a side).Try and use as few colors as possible when solving a level. Many of them can be completed in 3 or less. (Check the level select menu to see which ones you have left.)Fill the boxes with four colors, but don't let any segments touch. This puzzler starts easily but quickly picks up the difficulty...Color puzzle, fill game, challenge game, fun, entertainment
